data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dXhk3BmCNkAQ7kNvgHfsHEj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDCZiPRgpU-SDNRulu5hXWbWRw_d-ydxJoc0IpOEdiXjQ&oe=664B3237)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tznJZQViedkQ7kNvgEQ7_a7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB0m_5wxGaYqadkD5__wdYrWrKoFhiuI02-IyZB5e5vrA&oe=664B3FD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=87U6N4EvaPQQ7kNvgEReFFW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBuAF11nfvaYlAlKz6MIceRlAo1j-erlO7E2E6MQWe9Rg&oe=664B4350)
